achievements: Coursework completed

experiences.description: Ran global virtual program for 120 students from across the world. Worked with both the global team and students on learning initiatives, sessions, and coaching. Designed AI-based curriculum and focused on AI in business for students and staff.

achievements: Created natural language understanding framework for processing unstructured insurance claim's notes data and parse them into easily accessible knowledge for entire company and in-house knowledge graph

experiences.description: Designed and built generative AI systems and a custom in-house LLM to enhance internal processes and create smart insurance system using OpenAI's frameworks and APIs and Azure as well as open source LLMs.

achievements: Led the hiring initiatives, onboarding processes, career journeys, and overall best practices, and grew the team from one to 13 members
Developed 3-year data science project roadmap with nearly 40 projects
Developed the Data Science tech stack alongside DE and MLOps

experiences.description: Hired to build and lead a team of data scientists by designing the project roadmap, building out processes for hiring & onboarding and delivering high quality projects, including, but not limited to, work on user segmentation and a core NLP CS framework.

achievements: Led OT2 Search data science team to develop technology stack for company-wide AI framework

Developed transformer-based NLP frameworks for contextual understanding of documents and queries
Developed AI ranking to rerank search results from queries, company info, and document content
experiences.description: Designed and deployed entire data science pipeline for next-generation intelligent-search, utilising both machine and deep learning for search relevance. As the backbone of OpenText's new content delivery search platform, this must understand natural language queries and the content and context of any arbitrary documents, as well as process user and enterprise data profiles.

achievements: Developed soft and hard address matching techniques using libpostal and clustering algorithms

experiences.description: Built a network graph using bad actors as nodes and transactions and entity-connection-types as edges. This helps monitor and catch criminals; information gathered from these studies is eventually fed to CSIS and the RCMP.

achievements: Developed GPU-based RNN with TensorFlow and spaCy to predict future assessment results

experiences.description: After designing and building an SQL Server database, focused on developing a complete data pipeline. This included modernising the data use in SAE by implementing machine learning, especially natural language processing, on student and exam data.
